terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks
Class ThirdBlocks.BaseControl

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks.ThirdBlocks.BaseControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnableTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
ThirdBlocks.LiftControl, ThirdBlocks.RotateControl
Enclosing class:
ThirdBlocks
public abstract static class ThirdBlocks.BaseControl
extends java.lang.Object
implements EnableTarget

Constructs a base control with feedback and actuation input and output allowing it to be used as both a drag control source and as a control indicator target.

The control is in display overlay and consists of a stationary "back" and "frame", and a movable "mark". The mark moves relative to the mark and back center points in response to internal or external actuation angle. The mark is frontmost and the frame is backmost.

Making a control element pickable, such as with PickUtils.setGeoPickable(), allows the element to serve as a drag source for internal control actuation. The internal drag sensor uses the first button with no modifiers, and ignores arrow key input.

The input enable event interface controls the status feedback of the control as well as its internal and external actuation inputs.

Constructor Detail

ThirdBlocks.BaseControl

public ThirdBlocks.BaseControl(javax.media.j3d.Node mark,
                               javax.media.j3d.Node back,
                               javax.media.j3d.Node frame,
                               javax.vecmath.Vector2d dispOrigin,
                               javax.vecmath.Vector2d bodyOffset,
                               javax.vecmath.Vector2d markCenter,
                               javax.vecmath.Vector2d backCenter,
                               javax.vecmath.Vector2d markLimits,
                               double actScale,
                               ViewChangeSplitter viewSpltr,
                               AppView view)
Constructs a BaseControl.

Parameters:
mark - Control mark element. Null if none.
back - Control back element. Null if none.
frame - Control frame element. Null if none.
dispOrigin - Position of the control origin relative to the display window expressed as a fraction of the window size.
markCenter - Position of mark center relative to mark shape in pixels.
backCenter - Position of back center relative to back shape and control in pixels.
markLimits - Min/max limits on the actuation range of the mark as defined by the specific control type. Ignored if max limit less than min limit.
actScale - Scaling factor applied to the actuation output, and the inverse value applied to actuation input.
viewSpltr - Source for view change events.
view - Host view for the control.
Method Detail

getActuationSplitter

public ActuationSplitter getActuationSplitter()
Gets the control actuation splitter. Use it as an event target for external input to the control, and as an event source for external output from the control.

getFeedbackSource

public FeedbackSplitter getFeedbackSource()
Gets the control feedback event source. Use it as an event source for external output from the control.

getFeedbackTarget

public FeedbackTarget getFeedbackTarget()
Gets the control feedback event target. Use it as an event target for external input to the control.

setEnable

public void setEnable(boolean enable)
Description copied from interface: EnableTarget
Called when the target enable state needs to change.

Specified by:
setEnable in interface EnableTarget
Parameters:
enable - True to enable the target, false to disable it.

buildMarkGroup

protected abstract javax.media.j3d.Node buildMarkGroup(javax.media.j3d.Node mark,
                                                       javax.vecmath.Vector2d markCenter,
                                                       javax.vecmath.Vector2d backCenter)
Builds the mark group, which centers the mark, actuates it, and connects its actuator to the actuation splitter. Returns the root node of the mark group.

buildMarkDragger

protected abstract InputDragSplitter buildMarkDragger(AppView view,
                                                      ActuationTarget enabler,
                                                      javax.vecmath.Vector2d markLimits,
                                                      double actScale,
                                                      AbsoluteInputDragPlugin plugin)
Builds the mark dragger, which includes a drag sensor for the specified view, a gesture drag filter using the specified plugin for its origin, and a drag mapper. Connects the mapper to the specified actuation enabler, configures the mark actuator with the specified limits, and returns a splitter for the dragger.
